experiences.title: Programme/Software Developer
experiences.description:
Responsible for developing and maintaining the web-based applications to record and manage day-to-day activities in Care homes under Johnson Care Group.

● Executed multiple projects for the company with my team of 3.
● Successful maintenance of 2 different servers using DigitalOcean cloud infrastructure for projects.
● Introduced a SaaS system along with backup jobs using multiple tech stacks.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Promoted to lead and integrate multiple modules of a project. Responsible for analyzing the requirement, researching for the feasibility, defining the optimal solutions and leading the team to develop and present the project to the client. Built technical, communication and leadership skills while working as a tech lead for the project.

● Instrumental in managing a team of 11-25 members through the completion of a project.
● Guided the team with optimal solutions to approach various requirements within the project.
● Provided support and reviews for 5+ projects and modules within the company.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
